# Insights {.unnumbered}

Topic Selection are chosen based on CCDPH PH initiatives that have been researched, studied, or public health prevention strategies that have been implemented or been funded.
OR a comprehensive literature review to gather relevant research articles, studies, reports, and data related to the chosen topic. Ensure that the sources come from reputable and peer-reviewed journals, public health agencies, and academic institutions.
OR we have analyzed the collected data to understand the scope of the issue, trends, affected populations, risk factors, and any existing prevention strategies. Use statistical methods to quantify the impact of the issue and identify key patterns.
OR we have collaborated with public health partners, subject matter experts, and researchers in the field. Their insights and expertise can add credibility and depth to the document as such our partnership with RUSH related to SUID.
